p: This document describes how to upgrade a server from release 2.4.0 to release 2.4.1 of Hedgehog via packages.
There are no Hedgehog actions required for this upgrade.
This release only removes the explicit dependancy on PostgreSQL 9.3. It's purpose is simply to make it easier for users in the following cases:

ul.li: Perform a clean install with a version of PostgeSQL != 9.3
Perform an upgrade of PostgreSQL where the PostgreSQL 9.3 packages are going to be removed
